#include<stdio.h>

int str1[1001];
int main(){

		int n;
		int flag = 0;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){

			scanf("%d", &str1[i]);

		}
		while (flag<n){
			int k = 0;
				int count = 0;
				int min=str1[0];

				flag = 0;
				for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){
					if (min == 0&& str1[i]){
						min = str1[i];
					}
					if (str1[i] && min>str1[i])
						min = str1[i];
				}
				while (k < n ){
				if (str1[k] > 0){
					//if (str1[k] >= min)
					{
						count ++;
						str1[k] -= min;
					}/*
					else{
						count += str1[k];
						str1[k] -= str1[k];
					}*/
				}
				k++;
			}
			printf("%d\n", count);
			for (int i = 0; i < n; i++){
				if (str1[i] == 0)
					flag++;
			}
		}
		getchar();
		getchar();
	return 0;
}
